com.lodenrogue.rogue

Class EntityArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Entity>
      • com.lodenrogue.rogue.EntityArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Entity>

    public class EntityArray
extends com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Entity>
    Array extension. Contains capabilities to call entity render and update methods and search/return entities by id.
    Author:
    Miguel Hernandez

    • Nested Class Summary

        public void add(Entity e)

      • findFirstInstanceOf

        public Entity findFirstInstanceOf(java.lang.String partialID)
        Returns the first instance of an entity containing an id that matches the partialID. Returns null if none is found.
        Parameters:
        partialID - Partial string id to match with entity.
        Returns:
        Return entity or null if none found.
